ABOUT-ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT-ME.INTRO: Hey, I’m Lucas. During my business degree, one thing fascinated me above all else: how technology forms the core of modern companies. That curiosity quickly turned into a mission. Today, I combine my business expertise with solid software development skills and will be professionalizing this path academically through a degree in Business Informatics (Wirtschaftsinformatik) starting this April.
ABOUT-ME.LEARNING: Continuous Optimization: I strongly believe in the “1% better every day” mindset. I am driven to refine systems, optimize codebases, and stay at the forefront of new technologies.
ABOUT-ME.APPROACH: Explorative Curiosity: For me, standing still is not an option. I actively seek out new challenges and technologies to push beyond my comfort zone and broaden my perspective.
ABOUT-ME.LOCATION: Location: Based in Leipzig, Germany, and open to remote work.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Technology is my toolbox for solving real problems. I enjoy working with modern front-end tools and understanding how things work under the hood. The fast pace of the web excites me — new frameworks and best practices are a constant opportunity to grow. Clear structure, logical solutions and maintainable code guide how I work.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Contact me! I’m always expanding my stack.
SKILLS.TOOLTIP: I have a special interest in learning

FEATURED-PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
FEATURED-PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

ITEMS.NAME: Maik Groth
ITEMS.TEXT: Working with Lucas was highly productive and a true collaboration between equals. He works in a very structured and detail-oriented manner, which significantly improved the overall quality of our project. His execution was always clean and reliable, and he consistently provided solution-oriented ideas whenever challenges arose. A strong team player I would definitely work with again.

ITEMS.NAME: Leon Leuning
ITEMS.TEXT: Lucas was very strong in team communication and helped structure and coordinate our collaboration. He demonstrated clear leadership qualities and brought structure to our workflow. Thanks to his high standards and attention to detail, we were able to raise the quality of both the design and the code and deliver a strong final product. He worked quickly and reliably, which helped a lot — especially as we approached the deadline. His careful way of working was also genuinely educational and helped me grow personally.

ITEMS.NAME: Tizian Borges Jost
ITEMS.TEXT: Lucas has a sharp eye for detail and a deep understanding of frontend architectures. His contributions to our projects were always of the highest quality.

CONTACT-FORM.TITLE: Let's work together
CONTACT-FORM.DESCRIPTION: I enjoy contributing to real projects and getting involved in new challenges. I’m especially motivated by environments where I can take ownership and grow step by step.  With my business background, I bring a structured, solution-oriented perspective to technical challenges and think beyond code in terms of product and user value.
CONTACT-FORM.DESCRIPTION_CTA: If you’re looking for a frontend developer who thinks ahead, takes ownership and wants to grow long-term -
CONTACT-FORM.EMAIL_INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: Let me know your email address
CONTACT-FORM.PRIVACY_POLICY_TEXT1: and agree to the processing of my data as specified.
CONTACT-FORM.SUCCESS_FEEDBACK: Thanks for reaching out! I've received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.

SECTION_1.TITLE: 1. Data Protection at a Glance
SECTION_1.P_1: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. For detailed information on data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.
SECTION_1.Q_1: Who is responsible for the data collection on this website?
SECTION_1.A_1: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the 'Information on the Responsible Body' section of this privacy policy.
SECTION_1.Q_2: How do we collect your data?
SECTION_1.A_2_1: Your data is collected on one hand by you communicating it to us. This can be, for example, data that you enter into a contact form.
SECTION_1.A_2_2: Other data is collected automatically or after your consent when visiting the website through our IT systems. These are primarily technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page access). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter this website.
SECTION_1.Q_3: What do we use your data for?
SECTION_1.A_3: Part of the data is collected to ensure the error-free provision of the website. Other data can be used to analyze your user behavior. If contracts can be concluded or initiated via the website, the transmitted data will also be processed for contract offers, orders, or other order inquiries.
SECTION_1.Q_4: What rights do you have regarding your data?
SECTION_1.A_4_1: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time free of charge. You also have a right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given your consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. You also have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. Furthermore, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
SECTION_1.A_4_2: For this purpose, as well as for further questions on the subject of data protection, you can contact us at any time.

SECTION_2.TITLE: 2. Hosting
SECTION_2.P_1: We host the content of our website with the following providers:
SECTION_2.P_2: The provider is IONOS SE, Elgendorfer Str. 57, 56410 Montabaur (hereinafter IONOS). When you visit our website, IONOS collects various log files including your IP addresses. Details can be found in the IONOS privacy policy: https://www.ionos.de/terms-gtc/terms-privacy.
SECTION_2.P_3: IONOS is used on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in the most reliable representation of our website.
SECTION_2.P_4: This website is additionally hosted externally by: Vercel Inc., 440 N Barranca Avenue #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA. The personal data collected on this website (primarily IP addresses, meta and communication data) are stored on Vercel's servers.
SECTION_2.P_5: Hosting is carried out for the purpose of fulfilling the contract with our potential customers (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR) and in the interest of a secure and efficient provision of our online offer (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
SECTION_2.P_6: We have concluded contracts for order processing (AVV) with the aforementioned providers. This ensures that they process the personal data of our website visitors only according to our instructions and in compliance with the GDPR.

SECTION_3.TITLE: 3. General Information and Mandatory Information
SECTION_3.P_1: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very serious. We treat your personal data confidentially and according to the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
SECTION_3.P_2: When you use this website, various personal data are collected. Personal data is data with which you can be personally identified. This privacy policy explains which data we collect and what we use it for. It also explains how and for what purpose this happens.
SECTION_3.P_3: We point out that data transmission over the internet (e.g., in communication by e-mail) can have security gaps. Complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
SECTION_3.P_4: The responsible body for data processing on this website is:
SECTION_3.P_7: The responsible body is the natural or legal person who alone or together with others decides on the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g., names, e-mail addresses, or similar).
SECTION_3.P_8: Unless a more specific storage period has been mentioned within this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for data processing no longer applies. If you make a legitimate request for deletion or revoke a consent for data processing, your data will be deleted, provided we have no other legally permissible reasons for storing your personal data (e.g., tax or commercial storage periods); in the latter case, the deletion takes place after these reasons no longer apply.
SECTION_3.SUB_4: General Information on the Legal Basis for Data Processing on This Website
SECTION_3.P_9: If you have consented to data processing, we process your personal data on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR or Art. 9 Para. 2 lit. a GDPR, insofar as special categories of data according to Art. 9 Para. 1 GDPR are processed. In the event of an express consent to the transfer of personal data to third countries, data processing furthermore takes place on the basis of Art. 49 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR. If you have consented to the storage of cookies or access to information in your terminal device (e.g., via device fingerprinting), data processing furthermore takes place on the basis of § 25 Para. 1 TDDDG. The consent can be revoked at any time. If your data is required for contract fulfillment or for the implementation of pre-contractual measures, we process your data on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR. Furthermore, we process your data insofar as it is required for the fulfillment of a legal obligation on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. c GDPR. Data processing can furthermore take place on the basis of our legitimate interest according to Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR. Information about the respectively relevant legal basis in each individual case is provided in the following paragraphs of this privacy policy.
SECTION_3.P_10: In the course of our business activities, we work with various external bodies. In some cases, a transfer of personal data to these external bodies is also necessary. We only pass on personal data to external bodies if this is necessary for the fulfillment of a contract, if we are legally obliged to do so (e.g., passing on data to tax authorities), if we have a legitimate interest according to Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR in passing on the data, or if another legal basis allows the data transfer. When using order processors, we only pass on personal data of our customers on the basis of a valid contract for order processing. In the event of joint processing, a contract for joint processing is concluded.
SECTION_3.SUB_6: Revocation of Your Consent to Data Processing
SECTION_3.P_11: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You can revoke already given consent at any time. The legality of the data processing carried out until the revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.
SECTION_3.SUB_7: Right of Objection to Data Collection in Special Cases and Against Direct Advertising (Art. 21 GDPR)
SECTION_3.P_12: IF DATA PROCESSING IS BASED ON ART. 6 PARA. 1 LIT. E OR F GDPR, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT AT ANY TIME, FOR REASONS ARISING FROM YOUR PARTICULAR SITUATION, TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA; THIS ALSO APPLIES TO PROFILING BASED ON THESE PROVISIONS. THE RESPECTIVE LEGAL BASIS ON WHICH PROCESSING IS BASED CAN BE FOUND IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY. IF YOU OBJECT, WE WILL NO LONGER PROCESS YOUR AFFECTED PERSONAL DATA UNLESS WE CAN PROVE COMPELLING REASONS FOR THE PROCESSING WORTHY OF PROTECTION THAT OUTWEIGH YOUR INTERESTS, RIGHTS, AND FREEDOMS, OR THE PROCESSING SERVES TO ASSERT, EXERCISE, OR DEFEND LEGAL CLAIMS (OBJECTION ACCORDING TO ART. 21 PARA. 1 GDPR).
SECTION_3.P_13: IF YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS PROCESSED FOR THE PURPOSE OF DIRECT ADVERTISING, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT AT ANY TIME TO THE PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA CONCERNING YOU FOR THE PURPOSE OF SUCH ADVERTISING; THIS ALSO APPLIES TO PROFILING INSOFAR AS IT IS CONNECTED WITH SUCH DIRECT ADVERTISING. IF YOU OBJECT, YOUR PERSONAL DATA WILL SUBSEQUENTLY NO LONGER BE USED FOR THE PURPOSE OF DIRECT ADVERTISING (OBJECTION ACCORDING TO ART. 21 PARA. 2 GDPR).
SECTION_3.SUB_8: Right of Complaint to the Competent Supervisory Authority
SECTION_3.P_14: In the event of violations of the GDPR, those affected have a right of complaint to a supervisory authority, in particular in the member state of their habitual residence, their workplace, or the place of the suspected violation. The right of complaint exists without prejudice to other administrative or judicial remedies.
SECTION_3.P_15: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a standard, machine-readable format. If you request the direct transfer of data to another responsible body, this only happens insofar as it is technically feasible.
SECTION_3.P_16: Within the framework of the applicable statutory provisions, you have the right to information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient and the purpose of data processing at any time free of charge and, if necessary, a right to correction or deletion of this data. For this purpose, as well as for further questions on the subject of personal data, you can contact us at any time.
SECTION_3.P_17: You have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data. For this purpose, you can contact us at any time. The right to restriction of processing exists in the following cases:
SECTION_3.LI_1: If you dispute the accuracy of your personal data stored with us, we usually need time to check this. For the duration of the check, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
SECTION_3.LI_2: If the processing of your personal data was/is unlawful, you can request the restriction of data processing instead of deletion.
SECTION_3.LI_3: If we no longer need your personal data, but you need it to exercise, defend or assert legal claims, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data instead of deletion.
SECTION_3.LI_4: If you have lodged an objection according to Art. 21 Para. 1 GDPR, a weighting must be carried out between your and our interests. As long as it is not yet clear whose interests outweigh, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
SECTION_3.P_18: If you have restricted the processing of your personal data, this data – apart from its storage – may only be processed with your consent or to assert, exercise or defend legal claims or to protect the rights of another natural or legal person or for reasons of an important public interest of the European Union or a member state.
SECTION_3.P_19: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as orders or inquiries that you send to us as the site operator, this site uses SSL or TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from 'http://' to 'https://' and by the lock symbol in your browser line.
SECTION_3.P_20: If SSL or TLS encryption is activated, the data you transmit to us cannot be read by third parties.
SECTION_3.P_21: The use of contact details published within the scope of the imprint obligation for the transmission of not expressly requested advertising and information material is hereby contradicted. The site operators expressly reserve the right to take legal action in the event of unsolicited transmission of advertising information, such as spam e-mails.

SECTION_4.TITLE: 4. Data Collection on This Website
SECTION_4.P_1: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are:
SECTION_4.P_2: This data is collected on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR. The website operator has a legitimate interest in the technically error-free representation and optimization of his website.
SECTION_4.P_3: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details including the contact details you provided there will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry. The transmission of this data is encrypted via HTTPS.
SECTION_4.P_4: To ensure data security, we use server-side validations and protective mechanisms against Cross-Site-Request-Forgery (CSRF) and spam in our Angular and PHP-based application. The processing of this data takes place on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR (pre-contractual measures) or on the basis of our legitimate interest in the effective processing of the inquiries (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
SECTION_4.P_5: The data you enter into the contact form will remain with us until the purpose for data storage no longer applies (e.g., after processing of your inquiry has been completed) or you request deletion. Mandatory statutory provisions remain unaffected.
SECTION_4.SUB_3: Inquiry by E-mail, Phone or Fax
SECTION_4.P_6: If you contact us by e-mail, phone or fax, your inquiry including all resultant personal data will be stored by us for the purpose of handling your concern. We do not pass on this data without your consent.
SECTION_4.P_7: The processing of this data takes place on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR or Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR. The data remains with us until the purpose for data storage no longer applies or you request deletion.
